mapper.select: select saa.id, saa.price, saa.quantity, saa.transaction_time, ifnull(sell.sell_quantity, 0) as sell_quantity from sys_account_au saa left join ( select relation_id, sum(quantity) as sell_quantity from sys_account_au where invalid = 0 and transaction_type = 1 group by relation_id ) sell on sell.relation_id = saa.id where saa.invalid = 0 and saa.transaction_type = 0 and saa.quantity > ifnull(sell.sell_quantity, 0) and saa.price < #{filter.price} order by saa.id desc
